verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> again <WH3254> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> when Ehud <WH261> was dead. <WH4191>

And the LORD <WH3068> sold <WH4376> them into the hand <WH3027> of Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Canaan, <WH3667> that <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Hazor; <WH2674> the captain <WH8269> of whose host <WH6635> was Sisera, <WH5516> which <WH1931> dwelt <WH3427> in Harosheth of the Gentiles. <WH2800> <WH1471>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH6817> unto <WH413> the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> he had nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> chariots <WH7393> of iron; <WH1270> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> he <WH1931> mightily <WH2393> oppressed <WH3905> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And Deborah, <WH1683> a prophetess, <WH5031> <WH802> the wife <WH802> of Lapidoth, <WH3941> she <WH1931> judged <WH8199> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> at that <WH1931> time. <WH6256>

And she <WH1931> dwelt <WH3427> under <WH8478> the palm tree <WH8560> of Deborah <WH1683> between <WH996> Ramah <WH7414> and Bethel <WH1008> in mount <WH2022> Ephraim: <WH669> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came up <WH5927> to <WH413> her for judgment. <WH4941>

And she sent <WH7971> and called <WH7121> Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> out of Kedesh-naphtali, <WH4480> <WH6943> <WH5320> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Hath not <WH3808> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> commanded, <WH6680> saying, Go <WH1980> and draw <WH4900> toward mount <WH2022> Tabor, <WH8396> and take <WH3947> with <WH5973> thee ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> and of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Zebulun? <WH2074>

And I will draw <WH4900> unto <WH413> thee to <WH413> the river <WH5158> Kishon <WH7028> <WH853> Sisera, <WH5516> the captain <WH8269> of Jabin's <WH2985> army, <WH6635> with his chariots <WH7393> and his multitude; <WH1995> and I will deliver <WH5414> him into thine hand. <WH3027>

And Barak <WH1301> said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, If <WH518> thou wilt go <WH1980> with <WH5973> me, then I will go: <WH1980> but if <WH518> thou wilt not <WH3808> go <WH1980> with <WH5973> me, then I will not <WH3808> go. <WH1980>

And she said, <WH559> I will surely go <WH1980> <WH1980> with <WH5973> thee: notwithstanding <WH3808> <WH57> the journey <WH1870> that <WH834> thou <WH859> takest <WH1980> shall not <WH3808> be <WH1961> for thine honor; <WH8597> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> shall sell <WH4376> <WH853> Sisera <WH5516> into the hand <WH3027> of a woman. <WH802> And Deborah <WH1683> arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> with <WH5973> Barak <WH1301> to Kedesh. <WH6943>

And Barak <WH1301> called <WH2199> <WH853> Zebulun <WH2074> and Naphtali <WH5321> to Kedesh; <WH6943> and he went up <WH5927> with ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> at his feet: <WH7272> and Deborah <WH1683> went up <WH5927> with <WH5973> him.

Now Heber <WH2268> the Kenite, <WH7014> which was of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Hobab <WH2246> the father-in-law <WH2859> of Moses, <WH4872> had severed himself <WH6504> from the Kenites, <WH4480> <WH7017> and pitched <WH5186> his tent <WH168> unto <WH5704> the plain <WH436> of Zaanaim, <WH6815> which <WH834> is by <WH854> Kedesh. <WH6943>
And they showed <WH5046> Sisera <WH5516> that <WH3588> Barak <WH1301> the son <WH1121> of Abinoam <WH42> was gone up <WH5927> to mount <WH2022> Tabor. <WH8396>

And Sisera <WH5516> gathered together <WH2199> <WH853> all <WH3605> his chariots, <WH7393> even nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> chariots <WH7393> of iron, <WH1270> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, from Harosheth of the Gentiles <WH4480> <WH2800> unto <WH413> the river <WH5158> of Kishon. <WH7028>

And Deborah <WH1683> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Barak, <WH1301> Up; <WH6965> for <WH3588> this <WH2088> is the day <WH3117> in which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH853> Sisera <WH5516> into thine hand: <WH3027> is not <WH3808> the LORD <WH3068> gone out <WH3318> before <WH6440> thee? So Barak <WH1301> went down <WH3381> from mount <WH4480> <WH2022> Tabor, <WH8396> and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> after <WH310> him.

And the LORD <WH3068> discomfited <WH2000> <WH853> Sisera, <WH5516> and all <WH3605> his chariots, <WH7393> and all <WH3605> his host, <WH4264> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719> before <WH6440> Barak; <WH1301> so that Sisera <WH5516> lighted down <WH3381> off <WH4480> <WH5921> his chariot, <WH4818> and fled away <WH5127> on his feet. <WH7272>

But Barak <WH1301> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> the chariots, <WH7393> and after <WH310> the host, <WH4264> unto <WH5704> Harosheth of the Gentiles: <WH2800> and all <WH3605> the host <WH4264> of Sisera <WH5516> fell <WH5307> upon the edge <WH6310> of the sword; <WH2719> and there was not <WH3808> a man <WH259> left. <WH7604>

Howbeit Sisera <WH5516> fled away <WH5127> on his feet <WH7272> to <WH413> the tent <WH168> of Jael <WH3278> the wife <WH802> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite: <WH7017> for <WH3588> there was peace <WH7965> between <WH996> Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> and the house <WH1004> of Heber <WH2268> the Kenite. <WH7017>

And Jael <WH3278> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> Sisera, <WH5516> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Turn in, <WH5493> my lord, <WH113> turn in <WH5493> to <WH413> me; fear <WH3372> not. <WH408> And when he had turned in <WH5493> unto <WH413> her into the tent, <WH168> she covered <WH3680> him with a mantle. <WH8063>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, Give me, I pray thee, <WH4994> a little <WH4592> water <WH4325> to drink; <WH8248> for <WH3588> I am thirsty. <WH6770> And she opened <WH6605> <WH853> a bottle <WH4997> of milk, <WH2461> and gave him drink, <WH8248> and covered <WH3680> him.

Again he said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, Stand <WH5975> in the door <WH6607> of the tent, <WH168> and it shall be, <WH1961> when <WH518> any man <WH376> doth come <WH935> and inquire <WH7592> of thee, and say, <WH559> Is <WH3426> there any man <WH376> here? <WH6311> that thou shalt say, <WH559> No. <WH369>

Then Jael <WH3278> Heber's <WH2268> wife <WH802> took <WH3947> <WH853> a nail <WH3489> of the tent, <WH168> and took <WH7760> <WH853> a hammer <WH4718> in her hand, <WH3027> and went <WH935> softly <WH3814> unto <WH413> him, and smote <WH8628> <WH853> the nail <WH3489> into his temples, <WH7451> and fastened <WH6795> it into the ground: <WH776> for he <WH1931> was fast asleep <WH7290> and weary. <WH5774> So he died. <WH4191>

And, behold, <WH2009> as Barak <WH1301> pursued <WH7291> <WH853> Sisera, <WH5516> Jael <WH3278> came out <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> him, and said <WH559> unto him, Come, <WH1980> and I will show <WH7200> thee <WH853> the man <WH376> whom <WH834> thou <WH859> seekest. <WH1245> And when he came <WH935> into <WH413> her tent, behold, <WH2009> Sisera <WH5516> lay <WH5307> dead, <WH4191> and the nail <WH3489> was in his temples. <WH7451>
So God <WH430> subdued <WH3665> on that <WH1931> day <WH3117> <WH853> Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Canaan <WH3667> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And the hand <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> prospered, <WH1980> and prevailed <WH1980> <WH7186> against <WH5921> Jabin <WH2985> the king <WH4428> of Canaan, <WH3667> until <WH5704> <WH834> they had destroyed <WH3772> <WH853> Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Canaan. <WH3667>
